00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text.RegularExpressions;
00025 using Utilities.Web.OAuth;
00026 
00027 #endregion
00028 
00029 namespace Utilities.Web.Twitter
00030 {
00034     public class Twitter:OAuth.OAuth
00035     {
00036         #region Constructor
00037 
00041         public Twitter()
00042             : base()
00043         {
00044             this.SignatureType = Signature.HMACSHA1;
00045         }
00046 
00047         #endregion
00048 
00049         #region Public Functions
00050 
00056         public void GetRequestToken(out string Token,out string TokenSecret)
00057         {
00058             this.Token = "";
00059             this.TokenSecret = "";
00060             this.Method = HTTPMethod.GET;
00061             this.Url = new Uri("http://twitter.com/oauth/request_token");
00062             REST.REST RestHelper = new Utilities.Web.REST.REST();
00063             RestHelper.Url = new Uri(GenerateRequest());
00064             string Value = RestHelper.GET();
00065             Regex TokenRegex = new Regex("oauth_token=(?<Value>[^&]*)");
00066             Match TempToken = TokenRegex.Match(Value);
00067             Token = TempToken.Groups["Value"].Value;
00068             Regex TokenSecretRegex = new Regex("oauth_token_secret=(?<Value>[^&]*)");
00069             Match TempTokenSecret = TokenSecretRegex.Match(Value);
00070             TokenSecret = TempTokenSecret.Groups["Value"].Value;
00071         }
00072 
00079         public string GetAuthorizationSite()
00080         {
00081             this.Method = HTTPMethod.GET;
00082             this.Url = new Uri("http://twitter.com/oauth/authorize");
00083             this.AddParameter("oauth_callback", "oob");
00084             return new Uri(GenerateRequest()).ToString();
00085         }
00086 
00095         public void GetAccessToken(string PIN, out string AccessToken, out string AccessTokenSecret)
00096         {
00097             this.Url = new Uri("http://twitter.com/oauth/access_token");
00098             this.AddParameter("oauth_verifier", PIN);
00099             this.Method = HTTPMethod.POST;
00100             REST.REST RestHelper = new Utilities.Web.REST.REST();
00101             RestHelper.Url = new Uri(GenerateRequest());
00102             string Value = RestHelper.POST();
00103             Regex TokenRegex = new Regex("oauth_token=(?<Value>[^&]*)");
00104             Match TempToken = TokenRegex.Match(Value);
00105             AccessToken = TempToken.Groups["Value"].Value;
00106             Regex TokenSecretRegex = new Regex("oauth_token_secret=(?<Value>[^&]*)");
00107             Match TempTokenSecret = TokenSecretRegex.Match(Value);
00108             AccessTokenSecret = TempTokenSecret.Groups["Value"].Value;
00109         }
00110 
00116         public string UpdateStatus(string Status)
00117         {
00118             this.Method = HTTPMethod.POST;
00119             this.Url = new Uri("http://twitter.com/statuses/update.xml");
00120             this.AddParameter("status", Status);
00121             REST.REST RestHelper = new Utilities.Web.REST.REST();
00122             RestHelper.Url = new Uri(GenerateRequest());
00123             return RestHelper.POST();
00124         }
00125 
00132         public string GetTimeline(string UserName)
00133         {
00134             this.Method = HTTPMethod.POST;
00135             this.Url = new Uri("http://twitter.com/statuses/user_timeline.xml");
00136             this.AddParameter("screen_name", UserName);
00137             REST.REST RestHelper = new Utilities.Web.REST.REST();
00138             RestHelper.Url = new Uri(GenerateRequest());
00139             return RestHelper.GET();
00140         }
00141 
00142         #endregion
00143     }
00144 }
